songs.title: Falling Into You*
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]
...yesterday
And I'm falling into you

We make the nights side by side today
Outside in this rain has come away
On the side of the road
Took me to your house...



[Snippet]
Just for you got the eyes with the broken dreams
And all I ever wanted was a second to breathe a day
Now look out to sea as it comes you
But only for a second, then it sinks into the deep
I'm so far away
And I’m falling to the sea…
